basic.description:
Theoretical issues arising from the process by which activities are defined as deviant: such activities as 'sexual deviance', 'mental illness', and 'political deviance' examined.
NOTE    Only offered as distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Sociology of Deviance

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    A grade of C- in SOCY 122/6.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from SOCY 274/6.0; SOCY 275/3.0; SOCY 276/3.0
